scenario_text.value:
Hurry, Takuma! We gotta save them all, right
away!

(I get how she feels, but I can see Miu’s on
pins and needles. She has to calm down.)

(But well, we really do have to hurry here.
I don’t want to hamper Miu’s momentum.)
(What should I do?)
Suggest a breather.
Hurry on ahead!
Take a deep breath.
Stop, Miu. Take a deep breath first.
Now’s not the time for—
All right, now. Breathe in... Breathe out...
B-breathe in... Breathe out...
So? Calmed down a little?

Um, yeah... Sorry, Takuma. I kinda freaked
out there.

Hey, I totally get it. It’s just, if you
panic and get hurt too, we’d all hate that.
Okay, I’ll keep my cool!
You know just how to handle her, Takuma.
Hey! Don’t treat me like a kid!
Ahaha! Come on, let’s head out.
Hurry on ahead!
Yeah, you’re right. Let’s hurry!

We’d better hustle, Miu, but don’t get ahead
of yourself, okay?
Yeah, I know. The enemy could be anywhere.

We have to hurry, but we gotta be smart about
it.
Come on, Syakomon!
Yeah, here we go!
Hurry up! We’ve gotta save everyone!
*sniff*... We couldn’t save them...

It’s not your fault, Miu. Don’t beat yourself
up over it.
But... But I...

(Of course she’d be down about this... Still,
I can’t ignore her here.)

(I gotta cheer her up. Tell her we have
to...)
Save others out there.
Work for the fallen.
Save others out there.

You have every right to grieve, Miu. But we
can’t get tripped up here.

There’s still lots of creatures hurt out
there. They’re waiting for your help.

*sniff*... Yeah, I know. If I stop here, even
more are gonna die...
I can do this. Takuma, Syakomon. Let’s go!
Roger!
Work for the fallen.

Don’t cry, Miu. We have to look for the other
little ones out there.
Work for the fallen.
The fallen ones... *sniff*...
WAAAAAAH! It’s all my faaault...!

Takuma! Don’t say stuff that makes her think
about it more!
(Shoot. Bad choice of words.)

I-I’m not saying it’s your fault! Don’t
worry, we’ll save the others!

*sob* *sniff*... Yeah, you’re right. We’ll
save them for sure...
(Whew, okay. That seemed to calm her down.)

I want to save as many as we can, Takuma. I’m
gonna kick it up a notch!
Great. It’s all you, Miu.

I’m gonna look around here a bit longer. You
should check somewhere else, Takuma.
